acteurs: Frank Giering, Florian Lukas, Antoine Monot
beschrijving: Floyd will für immer weg. Doch bevor sie sich verabschieden, verbringen er, Ricco und Walter eine letzte Nacht in Hamburg. Eine Nacht, die alles verändert. Als Floyd ankündigt, am nächsten Tag auf einem Kreuzfahrtschiff zu arbeiten, blüht seine Freundschaft mit Ricco und Walter erneut auf. Zwischen Bartouren, Tischfußballspielen und Chaos in der Parkgarage wird dieser Abend zu einer unvergesslichen Herausforderung.

acteurs: Jeff Bridges, John Goodman, Julianne Moore
beschrijving: Jeff "The Dude" Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire of the same name, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.

acteurs: Ralph Fiennes, F. Murray Abraham, Mathieu Amalric
beschrijving: A writer encounters the owner of an aging high-class hotel, who tells him of his early years serving as a  lobby boy in the hotel's glorious years under an exceptional concierge.

acteurs: Gene Hackman, Anjelica Huston, Ben Stiller
beschrijving: The eccentric members of a dysfunctional family reluctantly gather under the same roof for various reasons.

schrijver: Wes Anderson, Roman Coppola, Jason Schwartzman
acteurs: Owen Wilson, Adrien Brody, Jason Schwartzman
beschrijving: Three brothers travel across India by train in an attempt to bond with each other after the death of their father.

schrijver: Wes Anderson, Roman Coppola, Jason Schwartzman
acteurs: Edward Norton, Bruce Willis, Bill Murray
beschrijving: A teenager and his friends discover a secret map to a fabled island that promises untold treasures.

schrijver: Wes Anderson, Roman Coppola, Jason Schwartzman
acteurs: Benicio del Toro, Adrien Brody, Tilda Swinton
beschrijving: A love letter to journalists set in an outpost of an American newspaper in a fictional 20th-century French city that brings to life a collection of stories published in "The French Dispatch Magazine".

acteurs: John Belushi, Dan Aykroyd, James Brown
beschrijving: Jake Blues, just released from prison, puts together his old band to save the Catholic home where he and brother Elwood were raised.

acteurs: John Travolta, Uma Thurman, Samuel L. Jackson
beschrijving: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

acteurs: Uma Thurman, David Carradine, Daryl Hannah
beschrijving: After awakening from a four-year coma, a former assassin wreaks vengeance on the team of assassins who betrayed her.

acteurs: Uma Thurman, David Carradine, Daryl Hannah
beschrijving: The Bride continues her quest of vengeance against Bill, the reclusive crime lord, and the team of assassins who work for him.

acteurs: Alana Haim, Cooper Hoffman, Sean Penn
beschrijving: A coming-of-age story that explores first love, friendship, and the pursuit of dreams in 1970s Los Angeles.

acteurs: Mark Wahlberg, Julianne Moore, Burt Reynolds
beschrijving: The story of a young man who becomes a popular star of the pornography industry in the late 1970s and early 1980s, and the people he meets along the way.

acteurs: Kevin Spacey, Annette Bening, Thora Birch
beschrijving: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend.

acteurs: Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman, Bob Gunton
beschrijving: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

acteurs: Jean Reno, Gary Oldman, Natalie Portman
beschrijving: Mathilda, a 12 year  old girl, is reluctantly taken in by Léon, a professional assassin, after her family is murdered. An unusual relationship forms as she becomes his protégée and learns the assassin's trade.

acteurs: Maren Eggert, Dan Stevens, Sandra Hüller
beschrijving: Alma is a scientist who agrees to live with a humanoid robot named Tom for three weeks as part of a research project. As they spend time together, Alma begins to develop feelings for Tom, leading to a complex and emotional relationship that challenges her understanding of love and humanity.

acteurs: Colin Farrell, Rachel Weisz, Olivia Colman
beschrijving: In a dystopian society, single people are given 45 days to find a romantic partner or they are transformed into animals and sent off into the woods.

acteurs: Robert Carlyle, Tom Wilkinson, Mark Addy
beschrijving: Six unemployed steelworkers in Sheffield decide to form a male striptease act to make some money, but they have to overcome their own insecurities and societal expectations to succeed.

acteurs: François Cluzet, Omar Sy, Anne Le Ny
beschrijving: After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caregiver, and they form an unlikely friendship.

acteurs: Franz Rogowski, Sandra Hüller, Peter Kurth
beschrijving: Christian, a shy and introverted man, starts working in a large warehouse and forms a bond with Marion, a fellow worker. As they navigate the monotony of their jobs and the challenges of their personal lives, they find solace and connection in each other.

acteurs: Kōji Yakusho, Yu Aoi, Ayumu Nakajō
beschrijving: Koji is a toilet cleaner in Tokyo who lives a simple and solitary life. He finds beauty in the mundane and takes pleasure in the small moments of everyday life. As he goes about his routine, he encounters various people who impact his life in unexpected ways.

acteurs: Daniel Brühl, Jürgen Vogel, Anna Brüggemann
beschrijving: Two men from different backgrounds form an unlikely friendship after meeting in a bar. As they spend time together, they learn from each other's experiences and perspectives, leading to personal growth and a deeper understanding of themselves and the world around them.

acteurs: Daniel Brühl, Katrin Saß, Chulpan Khamatova
beschrijving: After a young man’s mother falls into a coma for eight months and misses the fall of the Berlin Wall and the reunification of Germany, he tries to protect her from the shock by keeping her in the dark about the political changes that have occurred.

acteurs: Parminder Nagra, Keira Knightley, Jonathan Rhys Meyers
beschrijving: A young British Indian girl who has a passion for football faces cultural and familial obstacles as she pursues her dream of playing professionally, while also navigating her relationships with her family and friends.

acteurs: Shazad Latif, Anupam Kher, Naveen Andrews
beschrijving: A coming-of-age story about a young British-Pakistani man named Karim Amir who navigates his identity and sexuality in 1970s London, while also dealing with his relationships with his family and friends.

acteurs: Hidetoshi Nishijima, Toko Miura, Masaki Okada
beschrijving: A stage actor and director grapples with the loss of his wife while preparing for a production of Chekhov's 'Uncle Vanya' in Hiroshima, where he forms a complex relationship with his young female chauffeur.

acteurs: Greta Lee, Teo Yoo, John Magaro
beschrijving: Two deeply connected childhood friends are separated when one’s family emigrates from South Korea. Twenty years later, they are reunited for one fateful week as they confront notions of destiny, love, and the choices that make a life.

titel: Toen we van de Duitsers verloren
acteurs: Kylian de Pagter-Colin
beschrijving: After the lost final against Germany, everyone is hungover in the summer town it remains quiet. Jonas and Dan bump into each other and decide to explore the neighborhood to see if there is anything going on. Meanwhile, the realization sinks in that their classmate Catootje has been missing for five days - could she still be alive?

titel: The Worst Person in the World
acteurs: Renate Reinsve, Anders Danielsen Lie, Herbert Nordrum
beschrijving: Four chapters and an epilogue chart the existential struggles of Julie, a young woman navigating her identity and relationships in contemporary Oslo.

acteurs: Harry Dean Stanton, Nastassja Kinski, Dean Stockwell
beschrijving: A man wanders out of the desert after being missing for four years, and tries to reconnect with his son and find his wife.

acteurs: Bruno Ganz, Solveig Dommartin, Otto Sander
beschrijving: Two angels observe the lives of Berlin's inhabitants and long to experience human emotions and sensations.
